q_en: What are the orders for PolyU?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'PolyU';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "PolyU"

steps.sql: SELECT id, order_name FROM orders WHERE user_id = 1;
steps.description: Retrieve all orders for the customer with the name "PolyU"
